EmailTemplate.name: 2014 Announcement (all segments except E)
EmailTemplate.subject: 2014 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c} award announcement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are pleased to inform you that you have been named a 2014 Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}. Congratulations on being selected as part of this exclusive group of professionals in your area.
You are being recognized by the largest and most widely published award program in the industry. Your selection is the result of a rigorous research process that included a regulatory and consumer complaint review, and an evaluation of objective criteria associated with those who provide quality services to their clients.
We will contact you shortly to discuss options and opportunities available to you as a Five Star {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Profession__c}. In the meantime, you may contact us at 888-438-5782 with any questions.
You are receiving an honor that reflects your hard work and dedication. We look forward to working with you to share your good news.
Sincerely,
Jim Olson, CEO
Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway, Suite 120 Eagan, MN 55121 www.fivestarprofessional.com
